salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Registered Pharmacist) to LKR 350,000+ (Pharmacy Manager/Industrial Pharmacist) per month.
futureOutlook: The demand for pharmacists is stable and growing with the expansion of the healthcare sector. Beyond retail and hospital pharmacies, there are significant opportunities in the pharmaceutical industry (manufacturing, quality assurance, sales) and in regulatory bodies like the NMRA. This is a stable and respected profession.
